{"id":889611740,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"10 months, 1 week","timestamp":1675278441,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/889611740/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find the Pivot Integer","memory":"6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotInteger(int n) {\n        int left_sum=0,right_sum=(n*(n+1))/2;\n        for(int i=1;i<=n;i++){\n            left_sum+=i;\n            if(left_sum==right_sum)\n            return(i);\n            right_sum-=i;\n        }\n        return(-1);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-the-pivot-integer","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
